content: i loved the gloves i saw in the movie the hobbit - an unexpected journey and had to try to make them i am not affiliated with the folks who hold copyrights just a big fan i rank these patterns intermediate to advanced because of the cables but the other styles are not as detailed and could be appropriate for beginners these patterns have not been tested so please let me know if you find something confusing eta 2/5/14 added photos to help with oin cables specifically row 6-14 of the chart
